about_the_game:
Join our official Discord for the latest news, exclusive sneak peeks, and give us your feedback to help shape the game's development!



More features and details will be revealed in future announcements!

1-4 PLAYER CO-OP

Step into the world of Footy Bash, where the action never stops! Experience the rush of fast-paced football with 1-4 players like you've never seen before. Unleash spectacular speckys to leave your opponents in awe and land devastating hits to thrill your fans. With dynamic gameplay and a classic look, Footy Bash is not just a game—it's an electrifying footy spectacle. Are you ready to bash your way to victory?

Customise the look of your team

Before each match you have the opportunity to customise the look of your team, as well as each individual player. With 10+ team patterns, and a number of colour palettes, make your team truly your own!

Manage your team's stamina and health

Victory in Footy Bash is more than just scoring goals. Manage your team‘s resources to ensure you have the dashes and punches needed to break through, and temporarily knock down opponents who get too ambitious.

Master the intricacies of the game

From timing and chaining your special abilities, to hitting that perfect kick for significantly increased accuracy, Footy Bash will always have something else for you to try perfect.

Most importantly... have fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8800 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.0GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8800 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct 11 compatible
